SELECT COUNT(dvs.DDJRQ) as totalNum,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates
toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ))+1 as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toQuarter(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH, dvs.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) in (select dvs1.CJSDBH, max(dvs1.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs1
and dvs1.DDJRQ BETWEEN #{params.startTime}and #{params.endTime}
and dvs1.CQWH = #{params.cqwh}
and dvs1.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm}
group by dvs1.CJSDBH )
group by dates,groupName
, yearOfDates

SELECT COUNT(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME) as totalNum,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName, --品牌
dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName, --基地
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))+1 as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toQuarter(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH, dvs.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) in (select dvs1.CJSDBH, max(dvs1.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs1
and dvs1.SHIPMENT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime}and #{params.endTime}
and dvs1.CQWH = #{params.cqwh} --基地
and dvs1.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm} --主机品牌
group by dvs1.CJSDBH )
group by dates ,groupName
, yearOfDates

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum ,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
,dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName
,dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT v.CJSDBH,MAX(v.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 v
AND v.DTVSCFSJ != 0
AND v.DTVSCFSJ BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
AND v.CQWH = #{params.cqwh}
AND v.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm}
GROUP BY v.CJSDBH )
GROUP BY dates,groupName

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum ,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)) AS dates
,dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName
,dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT v.CJSDBH,MAX(v.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 v
AND v.THEORY_OUT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
AND v.CQWH = #{params.cqwh}
AND v.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm}
GROUP BY v.CJSDBH )
GROUP BY dates , groupName

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum ,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
,dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName
,dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT v.CJSDBH,MAX(v.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 v
AND v.SHIPMENT_TIME >= #{params.startTime}
AND v.FINAL_SITE_TIME <= #{params.endTime}
OR v.FINAL_SITE_TIME = 0
AND v.CQWH = #{params.cqwh}
AND v.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm}
GROUP BY v.CJSDBH )
GROUP BY dates , groupName

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) AS totalNum ,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME),9))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
CONCAT(toString(YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))),'-',toString(QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)))) AS dates
YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) AS dates
,dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName
,dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT v.CJSDBH,MAX(v.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 v
AND v.ACTUAL_OUT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime} AND #{params.endTime}
AND v.FINAL_SITE_TIME != 0
AND v.CQWH = #{params.cqwh}
AND v.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm}
GROUP BY v.CJSDBH )
GROUP BY dates , groupName
